meanings.definition: The gaseous envelope surrounding the earth.
meanings.sent1: The atmosphere is important for breathing.
meanings.sent2: The atmosphere protects us from harmful radiation.
meanings.sent3: The picnic had a lovely atmosphere with the sun shining and birds chirping.
meanings.sent4: Her presence created an atmosphere of calm and serenity.
meanings.sent5: The atmosphere at the concert was electric, with everyone cheering and clapping.

meanings.definition: A particular environment or surrounding influence.
meanings.sent1: The cozy atmosphere of the cafe made it a perfect spot to relax.
meanings.sent2: The competitive atmosphere in the office motivated employees to work harder.
meanings.sent3: The atmosphere at the party was so lively, with people dancing and laughing.
meanings.sent4: His positive attitude created an atmosphere of optimism among his friends.
meanings.sent5: The tense atmosphere in the room could be cut with a knife, as everyone waited for the results.
